name: Escape The Pyramid !
description:
Hi everyone,

The Ludum Dare #36 just finished and here is my contribution ! This is my first time so please be nice with me.

The game has been created with Godot Engine v2.1 and everything is by me (art, sounds, music) as I participated to Compo' LDJAM.

Godot Engine allows me to export for Linux Windows and IOS quite easily, so you can all test this somehow. A web version is being observed right now, but don't expect it to work eventually.

I'd like to thank bog, my coworker of ever that also participated and made me some food to eat haha.

Have a nice day friends !

Post Producing :

  • Fix (3:30pm 08/29/16) :
    • Buttons on splash screen are now disabled while animation is running so you can't press spacebar to reload the same animation in a loop.Buttons on splash screen are now disabled while animation is running so you can't press spacebar to reload the same animation in a loop.
    • The in-game menu window now disables the player controls
    • QWERTY keyboards can play, Q and A are left, Z and W are top.

Side Effects:

  • Thanks everyone, at least 15 view a day since I appeared in Godot Engine Showcase (on 24th Oct : 600 views and 120 downloads !)
  • Don't hesitate to give me feedbacks so I can do better next time (in December for LD37) !
